Rules: You must stay respectful towards staff and all players, no exceptions
Pretending to be a staff member on le bhop/surf pas ouf is forbidden
Do not spread false informations about the server
Shooting everywhere like a retard is forbidden
Using any type of cheats is forbidden, please report cheaters in the discord
Any form of DDoS threats will result in a permanent ban from the community
Sharing violent or pornographic content in any form is strictly forbidden
Voice chat is only for chatting, as the name implies! Do not mic spam (this includes screaming because you're angry at the map)
Only English and French are allowed
Please be courteous and check if a player is about to finish a map before asking for a server wide RTV
Commands: Get back to the map begining
Spectate others players (can also be accessed using F2)
Go to an other player (only available in Practice)
Enable / disable noclip (only available in Practice)
See how many requests are required for the vote to happen
See who has asked for a vote
See the time remaining before the start of a vote
Display the availables maps on the server
Display the maps you have completed
Display the maps you have not completed
See some informations about the map you are playing on
See how many time the map you are playing on has been played
Display the times in the style you are playing
Display the times in the map you want
Display the times in Normal style
Display the times in SideWays style
Display the times in Half-SideWays style
Display the times in W-Only style
Display the times in A-Only style
Display the times in S-Only style
Display the times in D-Only style
Display the times in Legit style
Display the times in Easy-Scroll style
Display the times in Unreal style
Display the times in Swift style
Display the times in Low-Gravity style
Display the times in AutoStrafe style
Display the times in SHSW style
Display the times in Backward style
Display the times in Bonus style
mywr, mywrs, wr1, wr#1, wrcount, wrcounter, countwr, wramount
Display the players ranking in the weird angles styles
Get a weapon (each following command being the name of a weapon)
Show some details about your SSJ
Enable / disable RNGFix (can be used if you experience some problems with boosters)
Show / hide the names of other players
Enable / disable water reflexion (can save you some FPS in some maps)
Ask to see the replay bot in the style you want
Display some informations about the available bot in the style you want
